trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Marion
There were no other sightings in Marion on or around December 5th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI went to my car to get something. When I was done, as always I looked up at the stars, only five seconds after looking up I noticed a translucent oval object right under the cloud line would be. It appeared to continue to go at a straight line weaving a little. Like maybe following a highway? I watched it till the houses wouldnt let me anymore. There was no sound, just pure bliss because I knew what I was seeing it was a ufo and was so excited that I am the Lucky one to get to see this wonderful experience. Ive been waiting along time for this. As I am very much into the universe!
Summary: {cak} was translucent and the size of a penny trvld east to west weaving like following hway right below cloud level
